title: LWC YouTube Legal Update from Bill Richmond | Ep 745
description: Big Tech is taking its shots against Louder with Crowder. YouTube has issued a hard strike and a temporary ban on Steven Crowder’s main channel. As the LWC team strategizes next steps in the fight against Big Tech, lawyer Bill Richmond offers updates on what is happening behind the scenes and issues an important message for Mug Club.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
